comments.text: In sqlite-based database tust information is kept in records separate from the certificate record the pertain to. cetutil needs to be able to display the trust records and thus be a better diagnostic tool.
comments.raw_text: In sqlite-based database tust information is kept in records separate from the certificate record the pertain to. cetutil needs to be able to display the trust records and thus be a better diagnostic tool.
comments.author: elio.maldonado.batiz@gmail.com
comments.creator: elio.maldonado.batiz@gmail.com

comments.text:
More exactly getting trust from the PKCS #11 module. 

pk11obj.c in mozilla/security/nss/pk11wrap have functions to lookup and manage the attributes of a generic PKCS #11 module. The definition of PKCS #11 trust is in mozilla/security/nss/util/pkcs11n.h


bob
